text: hananimkkeseoneun bulsinhaneun jadeul-ui yelo noaui anaewa los-ui anaeleul deusinola. geudeul(anaedeul)eun naui jongbogdeul jung seonlyanghaessdeon du jongbog mit-e iss-eoss-euna geudeul-eul baesinhayeossnola. geuleohgie geudeul(nampyeondeul)eun hananimkke gwanhayeo geudeul(anaedeul)ege geu eotteon botaemdo juji moshayeossnola. geuligo mogsoliga deullini ‘geudaedeul(anaedeul)eun (jiog-eulo) deul-eogal jadeulgwa hamkke buljiog-eulo deul-eogala’
